    WE'RE GETTING MARRIED!

    Mancano solo



    al nostro matrimonio!

    Hello friends and family!
    If you were looking for information about our wedding planning, you're in the right place!

    We’re very happy to celebrate with all of you, and we hope you can be there on our wedding day and for the rest of our lives.

    The key moments will be: the Ethiopian welcome dinner on Saturday, August 9th, the religious ceremony and the wedding party on Sunday, August 10th.

    Below you'll find all the useful information. Don’t forget to confirm your attendance HERE by May 11th.

    If you need anything, don’t hesitate to contact us
    (you know our numbers 😉).


    We love you.
    A big hug,
    Amalia & Bruk

    Afternoon of

    SUNDAY 10th AUGUST

    Event:
    Religious ceremony

    When:
    Sunday, 10th August, from 4:27 PM

    Where:
    Church of Vinci, "Mother Church of Santa Croce in Vinci"

    Parking:
    There is plenty of free parking available on Via Fucini and Via Montalbano. These are marked in blue on the map below.

    Other info:
    Once you’ve parked your car, there are several ways to access the church.

    The accessible routes are on Via Montalbano near the ticket office of the Leonardo Museum;

    or, near the Peace River Park-Zeffirelli Park.

    Event:
    Religious ceremony

    When:
    Sunday, 10th August, from 4:27 PM

    Where:
    Church of Vinci, "Mother Church of Santa Croce in Vinci"

    The accessible routes are on Via Montalbano near the ticket office of the Leonardo Museum;
    or, near the Peace River Park-Zeffirelli Park.

    Evening of

    SUNDAY 10 AUGUST

    Event:
    Reception

    When:
    Sunday, 10th August, after the Ceremony. Likely from 6:30 PM

    Where:
    Agriturismo Streda, at the Belvedere of Streda

    Info:
    Given the heat of August, there will be the possibility to cool off with a swim in the pool.

    It is available for our use until sunset (.. they close shortly after, alas!).

    So, if you're feeling good, don't forget your swimsuit!

    Parking:
    There is ample parking available in front of the venue! However, be cautious of the road, it’s unpaved...

    Other info:
    Come feeling good!!!

    How to get to Vinci?

    Whatever transportation you plan to take, don't hesitate to contact us if you have any doubts.
    Even better if, in the form below, you let us know if you need a ride and indicate which city you're coming from, or if you have available seats in your car.


    WE'RE WAITING FOR YOU IN VINCI !!!


    • If you're driving, exit the FI-PI-LI highway at EMPOLI CENTRO.
      Follow the signs to Vinci. The Church is located in the center of the town.
    • If you're traveling by train, the nearest train station is in EMPOLI.
      Alternatively, you can take an intercity bus (line 49 EMPOLI-VINCI).
      Let us know your arrival time, and we'll arrange to pick you up at the station!
    • If you're flying, the nearest airports are in Pisa ("Galileo Galilei") or Florence ("Amerigo Vespucci").
      From Florence airport, you can take the T2 tram to Santa Maria Novella station in Florence, and then take a train.
      From Pisa airport, you can take the Pisamover to the central station in Pisa, or enjoy a 15-minute walk to the station.
    • If you're arriving by Flixbus, EMPOLI is a stop. If it's not available, try Florence or Pisa.

    Participation and RSVP

    Don't forget to confirm your attendance HERE by May 11th! 😉

    A few things to keep in mind:

    • There is a swimming pool, don't forget your swimsuit!
    • We'd love to make the trip as stress-free as possible for everyone.
      If you have seats available in your car, or need a ride, let us know!
    • The entire Streda Belvedere property will be at our full disposal from Saturday afternoon until Monday morning:
      we've already booked all available rooms and apartments, and if needed, it's also possible to set up a few tents.
    • The main language will be Italian but please, don't be shy to speak in English! There are some people from around the world.

    If you've made it this far, what can we say, THANK YOU for even considering being part of Our Wedding.
    The most beautiful gift you can give us is your presence, not only on our Wedding day, but in our life.
